title: Phishing & Email Safety
description: Learn how to identify and avoid phishing attacks.

questions.prompt: Which of the following is the strongest sign that an email is a phishing attempt?

choices.text: The email is from a coworker.
The message creates urgency and asks you to click a link.
The email has a company logo.

questions.explanation: Phishing emails often create urgency to pressure users into clicking without thinking.

questions.prompt: It is safe to click a link in an email if it looks professional.
questions.explanation: Even professional-looking emails can be malicious. Always verify the sender and the link.
